name: growchief
description: GrowChief is an API based tool to automate your social media accounts such as sending connection requests and follow-up messages. Perfect for n8n / Make / Zapier users
features: Social Media Automation: Automate LinkedIn, Twitter, and other social media account activities via API.
Connection Requests: Automatically send connection requests to targeted profiles based on criteria.
Follow-Up Messaging: Schedule and send personalized follow-up messages to new connections.
API-First Design: RESTful API for integration with n8n, Make, Zapier, and custom workflows.
Campaign Management: Create and manage multiple outreach campaigns with different targeting rules.
Rate Limiting: Built-in rate limiting to comply with platform policies and avoid account restrictions.
Analytics Tracking: Monitor campaign performance with metrics on connections, responses, and engagement.
Workflow Integration: Seamlessly integrate with automation platforms for complex multi-step workflows.
